NAME: Advanced Splash
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 20% chance to damage enemies close to your primary target by a portion of your damage dealt to the primary target itself.

NAME: Air Attack
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower some basic Air damage on every attack.

NAME: Air Burst
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower a 20% chance to deal additional Air damage on an attack.

DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to multiply your projectile's Air damage.

DESCRIPTION: Increases your Air damage based on your current energy percentage. Full bonus is applied at 100% energy. Drains 200 energy whenever the bonus is applied.

NAME: Air Taste
DESCRIPTION: Deals additional damage of type Air based on a percentage of the total damage dealt. Damage of taste modules can not be further amplified.

DESCRIPTION: Provides a 10% chance to ignite all enemies in a large area around the primary target. Burning them for a specific amount of fire damage each second. Lasts up to 5 seconds.

NAME: Toxic Piranha Ivy
DESCRIPTION: Spawns a poisonous vine that emits a highly toxic poison that damages units with nature damage based on their current hitpoints and additionally slows their movement- and attackspeed. Has a 25% chance to emit heavy toxins(red color) instead which deals damage based on max hp and ignores any type of resistance or reduction. The poison lasts up to 60 seconds.

NAME: Steini's Chained Ball
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the tower's attackspeed in exchange for increasing its attack damage.

NAME: Omega Synergy
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the total Universal damage multiplier with the total Neutral damage multiplier raised to a certain power. Does the same thing vice versa.

NAME: Poison Sting
DESCRIPTION: Poisons enemies on regular attacks. Deals a percentage of the current hitpoints of the target as nature damage per second. Additionally lowers the target's nature resistance. Stacks with itself. Higher stacks decrease nature resistance further.

NAME: Volcano Gift
DESCRIPTION: Slowly increases the fire damage dealt by the user of this module. Resets when the tower dies or the current round restarts.

NAME: Google's Influence
DESCRIPTION: Increases the area of effect of all modules inside a specific category and reduces it for all the others. Using this module again cycles through all available modes which contain "spells" (active modules), "passive" (passive area effects) and "auras" (modules with aura in their name). Starts off with "spells". Google_HQ's influence made this module suddenly appear.

NAME: Immolation
DESCRIPTION: Burns nearby enemies in a 15m radius upon activation, damaging them by a percentage of their current hp as fire damage. Continuously drains energy. Damage is not affected by any multipliers except natural elemental multipliers.

NAME: High Mountain Gift
DESCRIPTION: Increases the area of effect of all active modules by a specific amount

NAME: Stampede
DESCRIPTION: Spawns a horde of goats that roams perpendicular to the direction between the tower and the casting point. Goats deal air damage based on the max. hp of an enemy upon contact. Goats might jump over enemies without touching them!

NAME: Metallic Ruins Gift
DESCRIPTION: Slowly increases the Electricity damage dealt by the user of this module. Resets when the Tower dies or the current round restarts.

NAME: Shoreline Boost
DESCRIPTION: Provides a bonus multiplier to outgoing Earth damage but divides outgoing Water damage by the same amount. Can be toggled to instead divide outgoing Earth damage and multiply outgoing Water damage.

NAME: Aquatic Absorption
DESCRIPTION: Whenever a Water enemy is being destroyed the owner of this module has a 24.9% chance to refill a percentage based amount of their shield.

NAME: Light Protection
DESCRIPTION: Increases your Light armor (abs. resistance) by an amount that is based on the maximum shield value of the tower. Bonus is only active when the shield is active.

NAME: Light Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Light damage by a percent based amount.

NAME: Light Shell
DESCRIPTION: Increases resistance against Light damage everytime the tower takes damage of the specified type. Stacks up to 100 times (multiplicatively) and lasts up to 4 seconds. Taking damage of the same type again refreshes the duration.

NAME: Magical Orbs
DESCRIPTION: Spawns magical orbs that circle around the tower and stun nearby enemies on contact for 3 seconds.

NAME: Magical Protection
DESCRIPTION: Removes a negative buff once in a while.

NAME: Magma Foundation
DESCRIPTION: A fiery foundation that provides the tower with some hitpoints and increases fire resistance but lowers water resistance. In addition outgoing fire damage is multiplied by 40.

NAME: Marble Foundation
DESCRIPTION: Sturdy foundation that protects you from the fundamentals of the universe. Divides incoming neutral and universal damage by 200. (Counts as neutral/universal resistance in the stats menu.)

NAME: Metal Plating
DESCRIPTION: A certain amount of electricity damage is prevented and instead dealt to a nearby enemy.

NAME: Nature Armor
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Nature damage by a fixed amount.

NAME: Nature Barrier
DESCRIPTION: Damages attackers by an amount (based on your max. shield points) of damage type Nature as long as your current shield points are greater than 0.

NAME: Nature Block
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to fully block incoming Nature damage.

NAME: Nature Exchange
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming Nature damage by a certain amount while at the same time multiplying incoming Electricity damage.

NAME: Nature Protection
DESCRIPTION: Increases your Nature armor (abs. resistance) by an amount that is based on the maximum shield value of the tower. Bonus is only active when the shield is active.

NAME: Nature Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Nature damage by a percent based amount.

NAME: Nature Shell
DESCRIPTION: Increases resistance against Nature damage everytime the tower takes damage of the specified type. Stacks up to 100 times (multiplicatively) and lasts up to 4 seconds. Taking damage of the same type again refreshes the duration.

NAME: Neutral Exchange
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming Neutral damage by a certain amount while at the same time multiplying incoming Universal damage.

NAME: Overcharge
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower a chance to receive +25% attackspeed for a certain amount of time whenever it receives damage from an Electricity type enemy.

NAME: Phasing
DESCRIPTION: A slight modification to the towers shield that allows it to completely block every few attacks. Only works as long as the towers shieldpoints are above 0.

NAME: Power Conversion
DESCRIPTION: Everytime the tower takes damage a part of its energy refills by converting the impact force in to raw power. Only works when shield is active!

NAME: Quantum Defense
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming damage by an exponential factor but requires energy everytime the tower is taking damage.

NAME: Quantum Fading
DESCRIPTION: Completely absorbs incoming damage for a certain duration every 20 seconds by shifting the lower part of the tower in and out of reality.

NAME: Refined Armor
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies each armor type of the tower by a constant value.

NAME: Reflect
DESCRIPTION: Damages attackers by a part of their own attackdamage.

NAME: Sandstorm
DESCRIPTION: Unleashes a huge sandstorm all over the map which slows enemies by 30% and reduces their general armor and therefore increasing their incoming damage And affects all enemies on the map.

NAME: Shelter
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to fully block incoming damage if the tower hitpoints are below 50%.

NAME: Shield Amplifier
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the maximum shieldpoints of the tower by a constant factor.

NAME: Shield of Air
DESCRIPTION: Engulfs the tower with a shield of Air which blocks a random amount of damage on each attack. If no shield is present then this ability will be inactive.

NAME: Shield of Darkness
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming Darkness damage by a specific amount as long as the towers shieldpoints are above 0. If no shield is present then this ability will be inactive.

NAME: Shield of Fire
DESCRIPTION: Absorbs incoming Fire damage and releases it in an explosion once every second. Deals the absorbed damage multiplied by a specific factor to all enemies around the tower.

NAME: Shield of Frost
DESCRIPTION: Slows the attackspeed of enemies that attack the tower. Lasts up to 5 seconds but refreshes once the unit attacks again.

NAME: Shield of Nature
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 25% chance that incoming damage permanently increases the towers hp-regeneration.

NAME: Shield Recharger
DESCRIPTION: Starts regenerating your shield by a percentage based amount after not taking any damage for at least 4 seconds.

NAME: Shock ward
DESCRIPTION: Creates a ward at the targeted location which stuns enemies once they enter its area of effect. Lasts up to 30 seconds before disappearing.

NAME: Simple Evasion
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower a small chance to fully neglect incoming damage.

NAME: Simple Heal
DESCRIPTION: Instantly heals the tower by a specific amount of hitpoints.

NAME: Stab Prevention
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to block incoming damage from assassins regardless of their elemental type.

NAME: Steel Foundation
DESCRIPTION: A solid foundation that provides less hitpoints than stone foundation but adds resistance to Neutral Fire Earth and Air damage.

NAME: Stone Foundation
DESCRIPTION: A very basic foundation for the tower which increases its hitpoints.

NAME: Strike Back
DESCRIPTION: Chance to gain an attackspeed buff when health below 60%.

NAME: Temporal Barrier
DESCRIPTION: Engulfs the tower with a temporary barrier that limits incoming damage to 3% of its maximum hitpoints per damage instance.

NAME: Tideshift
DESCRIPTION: Sets the whole map under water. Slows the movement- and attackspeed of all enemies by 50%. The buff lasts as long as the total duration of the ocean so affected units remain slowed for a while after it disappears.

NAME: Titanium Hull
DESCRIPTION: Temporarily increases the towers generic resistance by 99% and its generic armor by a variable amount. Lasts up to 60 seconds.

NAME: Transformator
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 12% chance to restore a part of your shield whenever killing an Electricity type enemy.

NAME: Unholy Aura
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the base resistance of nearby enemies against Darkness Fire Earth and Nature damage. Negative base resistance amplifies damage of the according element type.

NAME: Universal Exchange
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming Universal damage by a certain amount while at the same time multiplying incoming Neutral damage.

NAME: Water Armor
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Water damage by a fixed amount.

NAME: Water Barrier
DESCRIPTION: Damages attackers by an amount (based on your max. shield points) of damage type Water as long as your current shield points are greater than 0.

NAME: Water Block
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to fully block incoming Water damage.

NAME: Water Exchange
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming Water damage by a certain amount while at the same time multiplying incoming Fire damage.

NAME: Water Protection
DESCRIPTION: Increases your Water armor (abs. resistance) by an amount that is based on the maximum shield value of the tower. Bonus is only active when the shield is active.

NAME: Water Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Water damage by a percent based amount.

NAME: Water Shell
DESCRIPTION: Increases resistance against Water damage everytime the tower takes damage of the specified type. Stacks up to 100 times (multiplicatively) and lasts up to 4 seconds. Taking damage of the same type again refreshes the duration.

NAME: Whirlwind Aura
DESCRIPTION: Slows the attackspeed of nearby enemies.

NAME: Winter Gift
DESCRIPTION: #N/A

NAME: Generic Armor
DESCRIPTION: Reduces any Non-pure incoming damage by a fixed amount. Always applied after percentage based Reduction. Additionally reduces the attack range of the tower by 75%.

NAME: Snowstorm
DESCRIPTION: Slows the movement and attack speed of all enemies on the map by 25%. Stunned units take [tier]% of their maximum health as water damage per second.
TAGS: WATER ACTIVE INSTANT DEBUFF SLOW DAMAGE

NAME: Energy Sphere
DESCRIPTION: Reflects a massive amount of damage when toggled active as long as the current amount of energy is greater than 0 while at the same time draining 2% of your max energy per second and preventing any form of passive energy regeneration. The damage is of the same element as the tower.

NAME: Generic Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduce any incoming damage by a percentage based amount.

NAME: Aftershock
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to stun all units in a 10M radius around the tower whenever any active module is used. Has an internal 3 sec. cooldown after triggering.

NAME: Underground Gift
DESCRIPTION: Reduce the duration of stuns inflicted to the owner.

NAME: Heatwave
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to ignite all units in a 15m radius around the tower whenever an active module is used. Burning units take damage equal to 10% of their current hp plus a fixed amount per second. Damage type is fire.

NAME: Rain of Ashes
DESCRIPTION: Fills the sky with clouds of ashes. Enemies affected by them have a 25% reduced attack range and a chance to miss when attacking.

NAME: Aura Enhancement
CONDITION: Beat Perfect Space with Rocket Launcher
DESCRIPTION: Increases the radius of all aura modules for a certain amount of time. Every module with "aura" in its name is considered an aura.

NAME: Defense Overload
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 15% chance when casting a defensive ability to refill 20% of the maximum shield amount and supply the tower with a buff that divides incoming damage of any type and lasts up to 5 seconds. Stacks up to 50 times.

NAME: Storm Aura
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the attack range of nearby enemies.

NAME: Gaia's Protection
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the duration of debuffs by 100% for a specific amount of time.

NAME: Monsoon Aura
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the maximum hitpoints and attack damage of nearby enemies.

NAME: Gnarly Obsidian
DESCRIPTION: Passively multiplies Fire armor. Provides a chance to change the element of an attacker to fire and stun them in the process for 5 seconds.

NAME: Battery Foundation
DESCRIPTION: A very energetic foundation that provides some hitpoints and multiplies outgoing Electricity damage by 50. Outgoing attacks receive an additional damage bonus based on the current energy percentage of the tower. The bonus gets exponentially weaker the lower the energy percentage gets.

NAME: Diver's Shield
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 25% change whenever any active module is being used to make the Tower immune to water damage for a certain amount of time.

NAME: Ocean Gift
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the maximum hitpoints of the Tower.

NAME: Neutral Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming Neutral damage by a percent based amount.

NAME: Universal Block
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to fully block incoming universal damage.

NAME: Universal Resistance
DESCRIPTION: Reduces incoming universal damage by a percent based amount.

NAME: Refined Armor
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies each armor type of the tower by a constant value.
TAGS: NEUTRAL FIRE WATER NATURE EARTH AIR DARKNESS UNIVERSAL ELECTRICITY LIGHT ARMOR

NAME: Awareness
DESCRIPTION: Temporarily increases the experience points gained from destroyed enemies. (Refers to ingame XP not town XP.)

NAME: Condense
DESCRIPTION: Provides a small change to receive an exotic gem from destroying a Boss enemy.

NAME: Defensive Pack
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to upgrade a random defensive module at the beginning of a new wave for free.

NAME: Energy
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower with Energy which can be used to activate active skills.

NAME: Energy Flow
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the cooldown of active modules.

NAME: Energy Recycling
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the energy cost of all modules that require energy.

NAME: Energy Regeneration
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower the ability to passively regenerate energy.

NAME: Moon Energy
DESCRIPTION: Increases the energy regeneration of the tower based on how close the current energy is to 0%. Provides no bonus if the current energy is above 50%.

NAME: Neutral Response
DESCRIPTION: Turns all non-neutral enemies on the map into neutral type enemies.

NAME: Offensive Pack
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to upgrade a random offensive module at the beginning of a new wave for free.

NAME: Pressurize
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to turn destroyed enemies into some gems.

NAME: Recharge
DESCRIPTION: Instantly refills the towers energy to 100%.

NAME: Refresh
DESCRIPTION: Resets the cooldown of all other modules when used.

NAME: Sun Energy
DESCRIPTION: Increases the energy regeneration of the tower based on how close the current energy is to 100%. Provides no bonus if the current energy is below 50%.

NAME: Transmute
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to convert dead enemies into additional town resources by using the power of alchemy.

NAME: Wave Resources
DESCRIPTION: Produces a fixed amount of Town Resources at the beginning of a new wave.

NAME: XP Bonus
DESCRIPTION: Increases the amount of experience gained for destroying enemies.

NAME: Magical Stone of Floof
DESCRIPTION: Increases resources gained from destroyed enemies and from the module Transmute. Floof created this module by controlling chaos.

NAME: Tactical Maneuver
CONDITION: Beat Perfect Space with Double Cannon
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the energy cost of active offensive and defensive modules by a certain % for a certain amount of time.

NAME: Cooling Cell
CONDITION: Beat Perfect Space with Gatling Gun
DESCRIPTION: Absorbs and resets the cooldown of all offensive, defensive and ultimate modules that are currently on cooldown and applies the cooldown to this module instead. The sum of the cooldowns is additionally multiplied by a factor that cannot be reduced via any cooldown reduction bonus.

NAME: Jungle Gift
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the energy cost of active Defensive modules.

NAME: Return to Monkey
DESCRIPTION: Temporarily reduces the energy cost of all active Ultimate modules. For the duration of this buff the tower changes its base element type to Nature. Type priority: 5

NAME: High Tide
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the energy cost of all active modules but in exchange increases the cooldown of Ultimate active modules by 25%.

NAME: Low Tide
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the cooldown of Ultimate modules but in exchange increases the energy cost of all active modules by 10%.

NAME: Beach Gift
DESCRIPTION: Provides bonus energy regeneration that alternates between 0% and the current bonus amount in 1 minute cycles like a sine wave.

NAME: Dark Realm Gift
DESCRIPTION: Reduces the energy cost of active offensive modules.

NAME: Heaven Gift
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the max. energy amount of the owner by 1.1tier. Has no effect if the owner has no energy at all.

NAME: Crate of Rex
DESCRIPTION: Divides all resource drops from enemies while at the same time multiplying all xp drops by a constant factor. Can be toggled to swap the division and multiplication around.

NAME: Avalanche
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to multiply your outgoing projectile Earth damage by an exponential part of your Earth armor. The current multiplier is x^0.12 where x represents your current Earth armor. The multiplier cannot be lower than 1.

NAME: Bulwark
DESCRIPTION: Increases the towers damage the closer its hitpoints are to 50%. Passively multiplies the towers maximum hitpoints and all absolute resistances by 1000.

NAME: Conductor
DESCRIPTION: Converts a part of the incoming damage to shield points.

NAME: Dice of fate
DESCRIPTION: Use the power of this artifact to get random buff every few seconds. Has a chance to apply a negative buff.
TAGS: BUFF DAMAGE ATTACKSPEED BLOCK RANGE HEALTH SHIELD REGENERATION REACTIVE STUN

NAME: Division Shield
DESCRIPTION: Divides incoming damage by a fixed amount. Affects all damage types.

NAME: Eternal Wall
DESCRIPTION: Tremendously increases the hitpoints of the tower by raising them to a specific power.

NAME: Focused Multishot
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to attack all units around the primary target.

NAME: Gravitational Impact
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to deal a huge amount of damage to all enemies close to the primary target whenever attacking a universal type enemy. Splash damage type is universal.

NAME: Growth
DESCRIPTION: Increases the maximum hitpoints over time.

NAME: Hurricane
DESCRIPTION: Increases the attack speed by 40% all air damage dealt by 5000% and attackrange of the tower by 20%.
TAGS: ACTIVE INSTANT RANGE DAMAGE ATTACKSPEED BUFF

NAME: Immortality Shield
DESCRIPTION: Completely nullifies any incoming damage for a certain amount of time.

NAME: Infinity Range
DESCRIPTION: Permanently increases the towers attack range by a fixed multiplier. Stacks with other range bonuses multiplicatively.

NAME: Lucky Shot
DESCRIPTION: Provides a small chance to multiply your damage by an amount on an attack.

NAME: Neutral Amplifier
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies outgoing Neutral damage as well as the damage dealt against Neutral enemies.

NAME: Photosynthesis
DESCRIPTION: Increases the towers Nature damage for every Light enemy killed (multiplicative with other bonuses additive to itself). The bonuse damage stays until the end of a round.

NAME: Power of the Cat
DESCRIPTION: Provides the tower with up to 9 layers that block incoming lethal attacks. Drains 1 layer per blocked attack. Layers slowly regenerate over time and are displayed in the form of a buff/status effect.

NAME: Radar
DESCRIPTION: Doubles the tower's attack range for a certain amount of time.

NAME: Rejuvenate
DESCRIPTION: Increases the towers hp regeneration for each kill until the end of the current round. Works multiplicatively but additive to itself. Does not affect %-based regeneration.

NAME: Serious Missile
DESCRIPTION: An incredibly refined module that provides a small chance to instantly destroy a non-Boss unit.
TAGS: DAMAGE ARCHER WIZARD ASSASSIN NORMAL TANK

NAME: Snap of Destiny
DESCRIPTION: Erases half of all enemies from the map.

NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTION: Hardens the towers walls and provides a chance to stun attackers for a certain amount of time. Works against ranged attackers as well.

NAME: Stream of Life
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the damage bonus of Nature damage by x^0.1 where x is the current health regeneration of the tower at the moment of using this module. Disables health regeneration of the tower for the duration of the buff.

NAME: Super Tower
DESCRIPTION: Boosts the tower attack speed by 50% multiplies the max. health and health regeneration by 3 and decreases incoming damage by 50%.
TAGS: ACTIVE INSTANT BUFF HEALTH REGENERATION RESISTANCE ATTACKSPEED

NAME: Super Tower 2
DESCRIPTION: Massively boosts the tower attack speed (+400%) and multiplies it's energy regeneration by 4.
TAGS: ACTIVE INSTANT ATTACKSPEED ENERGY REGENERATION BUFF

NAME: Super Tower 3
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies the towers outgoing projectile damage by 1000000 and maximum shield by 100.
TAGS: ACTIVE INSTANT INFINITY DAMAGE SHIELD BUFF

NAME: Unfolding
DESCRIPTION: Increases the maximum shieldpoints over time.

NAME: Universal Shield
DESCRIPTION: Blocks the first 2 hits from a single enemy. Afterwards there is a small chance that one more hit will be blocked.

NAME: Void
DESCRIPTION: Creates a dark void in the targeted area that immediately destroys neutral and universal enemies that enter it.

NAME: Mjölnir
DESCRIPTION: Increases the towers electricity damage for every ice giant... erm... tank or boss enemy killed (multiplicative with other bonuses, additive to itself). The bonus damage stays until the end of a round.

NAME: Knight's Boost of Power
DESCRIPTION: This module increases xp gain and has two states: 1)Increase attack speed and decrease range 2)Decrease attack speed and increase range. By KnightJR

NAME: W.I.N.C.E.
DESCRIPTION: #N/A

NAME: Deep Slumber
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance to stun the primary target for one year. If the attempt fails, the target will become immune to the effects of this ability for a certain amount of time.

NAME: L.O.S.O. Drone System
DESCRIPTION: #N/A

NAME: Tremors
DESCRIPTION: Provides a chance which is evaluated per individual stunned enemy on the map to set that particular enemies' health to 1.

NAME: Neutral Gift
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies all outgoing Neutral damage by a constant factor and divides all outgoing damage from other elements by half of the amount.

NAME: Unholy Cloak
DESCRIPTION: Surrounds the user with an unholy cloak that turns incoming Darkness damage into a heal of the same amount.

NAME: Grim Reaper
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 25+((tier-1)/4)% chance to apply a debuff to an enemy. If an enemy already contains the Grim Reaper debuff it will die instantly. The debuff lasts up to 10 seconds. Does not work on Darkness or Boss enemies.

NAME: Sky Blessing
DESCRIPTION: Provides a small chance to become invulnerable for 0.5 seconds against all types of damage when taking air or light damage.

NAME: Universe Gift
DESCRIPTION: Provides a small damage bonus to specific element damage based on the type of a destroyed enemy. Each element has its own bonus counter. Using any active module multiplies all counters by x0.95.

NAME: Captain's Reflect
DESCRIPTION: Reflects a part of incoming damage as pure damage when activated. Lasts up to 5 seconds.

NAME: Something
DESCRIPTION: Spawns something. Anything that touches something will die.

NAME: Absolute Zero
DESCRIPTION: Freezes time itself. Equipping your tower with this module slows the passage of time itself by 50%.

NAME: Infinity Foundation
DESCRIPTION: Allows the tower to survive attacks from infinity enemies. In exchange the maximum hitpoints shield and hitpoint regeneration are reduced to x^0.5.

NAME: Infinity Shield
DESCRIPTION: Partially reverts the shield debuff from infinity foundation. Shield is increased by x^1.5. Only works if infinity foundation is equipped.

NAME: Rak's Curse
DESCRIPTION: On activation there is a 0.1% chance to permanently buff the tower's Max Health Energy Regeneration and Spell Cooldown. 99.8% chance that nothing happens. 0.1% chance to meltdown and destroy the tower. Rak created this curse with the power of lost savegames.Note: The buff lasts until the round ends.
TAGS: COMMUNITY ACTIVE INSTANT CHANCE BUFF HEALTH REGENERATION

NAME: Reboot
DESCRIPTION: Sets the current hitpoints of the tower to EXACTLY 1

NAME: Universal
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the tower from Neutral to Universal and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of Universal to it.

NAME: Infinity Energy
DESCRIPTION: Reverts the energy regeneration debuff from infinity foundation but in exchange increases all module cooldowns by 25%. Only works if infinity foundation is equipped.

NAME: Infinity Regeneration
DESCRIPTION: Reverts the health regeneration debuff from infinity foundation but in exchange raises maximum hitpoints of the tower to the power of 0.9. Only works if infinity foundation is equipped.

NAME: Molten Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the tower from neutral to fire and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of fire to it. If other modules that change the element of the owner are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type priority: 1

NAME: Borf
CONDITION: Beat Perfect Space with Gauss Cannon
DESCRIPTION: Permastuns the tower but in exchange reduces the cooldown and energy cost of all offensive modules by 90%. The cooldown of all other modules increases by 100%

NAME: Aero Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the tower from neutral to air and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of air to it. If other modules that change the element of the owner are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type priority: 4

NAME: Magnetic Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the tower from Neutral to Electricity and therefore applies all defaul strengths and weaknesses of Electricity to it. If other modules that change the element of owner are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type Priority: 8

NAME: Ocean Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the Tower from Neutral to Water and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of Water to it. If other modules that change the element of the Tower are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type Priority: 2

NAME: Soul Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the Tower from Neutral to Darkness and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of Darkness to it. If other modules that change the element of the owner are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type priority: 7

NAME: Angelic Core
DESCRIPTION: Changes the base type of the Tower from Neutral to Light and therefore applies all default strengths and weaknesses of Light to it. If other modules that change the element of the Tower are present then the one with the highest type priority overrides the others. Type Priority: 6

NAME: Kit's Toolkit
DESCRIPTION: Multiplies outgoing projectile damage of any type by a constant factor that gets divided for each module inside your blueprint other than itself. Multiplier cannot go below 1.

NAME: Chaos Gift
DESCRIPTION: Provides a 1+((tier-1)/4)% chance to cast an active module with a ground target a second time at a random location within the caster's attack range with no additional cost. The second cast does not trigger any modules that react to active modules.

NAME: Confusion Field
DESCRIPTION: All units in the targeted area temporarily change their ownership to the owner of this module. They additionally gain a multiplicative bonus to their attack damage. Lasts up to 15sec. radius depends on tier.

NAME: Bluecat's Harmonizer
DESCRIPTION: Spoiler

NAME: Daigoparry
DESCRIPTION: Parry the next 15 hits that would kill you
